'''''To You in a Hundred Years''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Memories of the Heart]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must read all three letters during ''Thoughts That Wandered For a Century'' in {{Quest|Wanderings of a Lonesome Shadow}}. They can be found next to the [[Aeonblight Drake]] after it collapses in front of [[Faruzan]].
